title: Angels make dua for you as long as you remain in your place of prayer? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: uh Muhammad from Spain I have a question I know that the Angels keep doing upon us as long as we stay in the spot with that we pray that is all this also apply to voluntary prayers does this apply to voluntary prayers it seems it seems that it does because the prophet Allah says one of you is still in prayer as long as he remains in his position so he did not iso's son specify whether it is a far or voluntary as long as you've concluded your prayer whether it's fought or voluntary then the Angels still pray for you and upon you and Allah Knows Best
